static String removeChar(String S, char ch)
          Looks for the first instance of a given character in a specified string; if found, the character is removed, otherwise, the original string is returned.

removeChar

public static String removeChar(String S,
                                char ch)
Looks for the first instance of a given character in a specified string; if found, the character is removed, otherwise, the original string is returned.

Parameters:
name - a String
numRounds - a character

testAnagrams

public static void testAnagrams(String word1,
                                String word2)
Tests if two provided words are anagrams and prints a sentence indicating the result of the test. Two words that are the same word are not considered anagrams

Parameters:
name - a String
numRounds - a String
